mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... The Beverly factory was begun circa 1902 and continued in phases over a span of 96 years, through the present renovation. Cummings Center, the former USM site, is today a massive complex of renovated commercial buildings, home to a thriving and diverse network of more than 500 on-site businesses. Since its purchase of the property in 1996, Cummings Properties has worked closely with Beverly Historical Society to preserve much of The Shoe's rich history..." -- http://www.cummings.com/history.html -- http://www.cummings.com/arc.html -- http://www.cummings.com/cc_prospect_email_insert.htm [work]
